page.title: 12RECREATION & LIFESTYLES
page.content: {Indoor games}_ table tennis,snooker, eucre,whist,chess,darts,judo,various board and computer games. {Outdoor games }_ riding,cricket,walking,gardening, jogging,roller skating,fishing, sailing,cycling,ferreting,shooting, hunting,swimming,golf,netball, athletics,cross country,sheaf pitching,windsurfing. {Art and craft }_ painting,knitting, dressmaking,embroidery,crochet,model planes,quilting,applique. {Non Art and Craft}_ poetry,reading, bell ringing,stamp collecting, photography, music, birdwatching. Disco's are sometimes held.
